topics.body:
So my mom's dog is close to her due date.
She has four puppies wriggling around in her.
My mom asked what we should name them and a told her we should name all of them "five hundered dollars."

topics.body:
Little Busters.
!http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/192/3/7/we_are_the_little_busters__by_squallec-d711t5t.jpg!

[spoiler]When I first watched the show, it was all innocent and stuff. But then they decided to throw reality at us in the face.
Apparently, all the adventures they had were just remade memories. Most of the main cast died in an accident and as spirits, they decided to help the surviving cast mature so that they can go with their lives without them. To do that, they created a fake reality to relive the precious high school moments before the accident. They erased the memories of the survivors so that they won't go into depression and relive these moments until they're strong enough to face reality.
In the end, the spirits left by telling them the truth and the survivors woke up.[/spoiler]
